item.title: A quarter of CFOs say they’re decreasing hiring and cutting capital spending in response to tariffs, survey shows
item.description: Tariffs emerged as the top concern of the CFOs from 400 firms who took the survey, followed by inflation and monetary policy.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried parts ways with ‘Diddy’ as feds transfer crypto conman from Brooklyn prison to Oklahoma
item.description: The former FTX CEO is presumably en route to California, where his parents live.

item.title: Publishers, journalists and film producers attack ‘fundamentally flawed’ plan for enforcing Europe’s new AI law

item.title: LVMH heir Alexandre Arnault will join the board of top-end ski wear brand Moncler after the French giant struck a deal with its CEO
item.description: LVMH bought a 10% minority stake in Double R, Moncler’s largest shareholder and the vehicle owned by its CEO Remo Ruffini, six months ago.
